episode.title: Headline Goes Here
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest Jim Dalrymple returns to the show to discuss the past and future of Apple-centric reporting.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest Jim Dalrymple returns to the show to discuss the past and future of Apple-centric reporting.

Sponsored by:

  • Mack Weldon: Radically-efficient wardrobing.
  • LinkedIn Talent.
  • Linode: Instantly deploy and manage an SSD server in the Linode Cloud. New accounts get a $100 credit.

Links:

  • MacCentral circa November 1996, as cached by the Internet Archive. Among the news of the week: the release of BBEdit 4.0.2 and Cyberdog 1.2 beta 2. One of those had a longer shelf life than the other.
